message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product, but I am only able to offer $18,000.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm confident this product is worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $19,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $18,500.
